title: Defeat Ketheric Thorm
content:
become more powerful.

Defeat Ketheric Thorm Objectives

Defeat Ketheric Thorm Walkthrough

After fighting Knessa Bonedaughter and the others, look for the path behind them and you will find a Restoration that looks like a mushroom. Interact with it to replenish your health to prepare your party for what’s coming.

In the distance below, you will see an area that is separated from the Mind Flayer Colony which seems to be like a grand stage. There's a Neural Apparatus that serves as a lift that w
